translation: Then he comes into contact with the knowledge acquired in his former body and strives even more for perfection, O Arjuna.
commentary: 6.43 There there? That's him? Buddhisamyogam union with knowledge? Gets obtains? pre-body acired in his fomer body? strives to try? f and? Then than that? More more? sansiddhau for perfection? Kurunandana O son of the Kurus.Commentary When he takes a human body again in this world his previous exertions and practice in the path of Yoga are not wasted. Do they bear full fruit now? and hasten his moral and spiritual
